data.text:
(Observe as the race develops, 
and save stamina for the last spurt)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿(Observe as the race develops, 
󠁿and save stamina for the last spurt)

data.text:
(That's supposed to help maintain my speed, and it's the running 
style with the highest probability of victory. Even I don't 
believe that that's incorrect… but)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿(That's supposed to help maintain my speed, and it's the running 
󠁿style with the highest probability of victory. Even I don't 
󠁿believe that that's incorrect… but)

data.text: ([As if you haven't sorted out your own feelings]-)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿([As if you haven't sorted out your own feelings]-)

data.text:
(<Sirius>'s Trainer's words, 
I can't stop thinking about them…)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿(<Sirius>'s Trainer's words, 
󠁿I can't stop thinking about them…)

data.text:
C'mon!! Don't stand there spacin' out!! 
If you wanna become Japan's #1 then run like hell!!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
󠁿C'mon!! Don't stand there spacin' out!! 
󠁿If you wanna become Japan's #1 then run like hell!!

data.text: U-understoooood!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿U-understoooood!!

data.text: (I thought I was also running towards my dreams.)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿(I thought I was also running towards my dreams.)

data.text:
(…If that's the case, 
why does it seem like the "scenery" is so hazy?)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿(…If that's the case, 
󠁿why does it seem like the "scenery" is so hazy?)

data.text: …One more lap…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…One more lap…!

data.text:
Congratulations, on your race today! 
That's 2 consecutive wins! 2 in a row!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Congratulations, on your race today! 
󠁿That's 2 consecutive wins! 2 in a row!!

data.text:
Um… Thank you very much. 
How many times have you said that already…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Um… Thank you very much. 
󠁿How many times have you said that already…?

data.text:
It's important, so I'll say it as many times as I can! 
That's just how awesome it is!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿It's important, so I'll say it as many times as I can! 
󠁿That's just how awesome it is!

data.text:
On the last straight, when Suzuka-san just zooms by…! 
Doesn't it feel good to outpace everyone in one go?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿On the last straight, when Suzuka-san just zooms by…! 
󠁿Doesn't it feel good to outpace everyone in one go?!

data.text:
I don't really understand much about pacing, 
so it makes me feel like I need to practice more!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿I don't really understand much about pacing, 
󠁿so it makes me feel like I need to practice more!

data.text:
Um… Suzuka-san? For some reason, it feels like 
you're not that happy about your victory…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Um… Suzuka-san? For some reason, it feels like 
󠁿you're not that happy about your victory…

data.text: Eh…? No, of course I'm happy about it.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Eh…? No, of course I'm happy about it.

data.text:
Speaking of which, Special Week-san, how are things going for 
you? Team <Sirius> seems like it's very lively.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Speaking of which, Special Week-san, how are things going for 
󠁿you? Team <Sirius> seems like it's very lively.

data.text:
Everyone treats me well, so it's fun! We're all working together 
and trying to come up with the perfect running style for me!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Everyone treats me well, so it's fun! We're all working together 
󠁿and trying to come up with the perfect running style for me!

data.text:
Sometimes Gold Ship-san forces some weird, incomprehensible 
training on me… but I'm really glad I joined!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Sometimes Gold Ship-san forces some weird, incomprehensible 
󠁿training on me… but I'm really glad I joined!

data.text: …If that's the case, then I'm glad.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…If that's the case, then I'm glad.

data.text:
Ehehe, Yep! From here on, I'm going to continue doing 
my best to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Ehehe, Yep! From here on, I'm going to continue doing 
󠁿my best to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!!

data.text:
(You're really straight-forward when it comes to your dream 
aren't you, Special Week-san…?)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿(You're really straight-forward when it comes to your dream 
󠁿aren't you, Special Week-san…?)

data.text: …Hey Suzuka, you're spacing out again.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: 󠁿…Hey Suzuka, you're spacing out again.

data.text: Eh?! Oh, I'm sorry.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Eh?! Oh, I'm sorry.

data.text:
Is something bothering you? Even though you've got consecutive 
victories and impressive results.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
󠁿Is something bothering you? Even though you've got consecutive 
󠁿victories and impressive results.

data.text: …I don't know.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…I don't know.

data.text:
I've won races, but something seems 
off with the "scenery" I saw…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿I've won races, but something seems 
󠁿off with the "scenery" I saw…

data.text:
…How about taking a break and relaxing for a bit? 
Knowledge is important, but so is your mental state.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
󠁿…How about taking a break and relaxing for a bit? 
󠁿Knowledge is important, but so is your mental state.

data.text:
Thank you. 
But the [Derby] is next, I can't relax just yet.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Thank you. 
󠁿But the [Derby] is next, I can't relax just yet.

data.text: …Next time, for sure, I'll win…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…Next time, for sure, I'll win…

data.text: Haa… haa… fuu…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Haa… haa… fuu…

data.text:
Looks like you've grasped the pace needed for 2400m races. 
And you've got stamina leftover, too.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Looks like you've grasped the pace needed for 2400m races. 
󠁿And you've got stamina leftover, too.

data.text:
You have the strength to conquer Classic Races. 
Win, and take hold of your dream!
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿You have the strength to conquer Classic Races. 
󠁿Win, and take hold of your dream!

data.text: Yes…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Yes…!

data.text: Speeee! What's your dreeeeeam?!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: 󠁿Speeee! What's your dreeeeeam?!

data.text: "Japan's #1 Uma Musumeeee"!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿"Japan's #1 Uma Musumeeee"!

data.text:
Hell yeah! Work hard to become Japan's #1! 
Show me your guts!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
󠁿Hell yeah! Work hard to become Japan's #1! 
󠁿Show me your guts!

data.text: Guuuuuuts!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Guuuuuuts!!

data.text: You should be training with us, shouldn't you?!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: 󠁿You should be training with us, shouldn't you?!

data.text:
(…This isn't the time to be getting distracted. 
I need to focus on running toward my dream…!)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿(…This isn't the time to be getting distracted. 
󠁿I need to focus on running toward my dream…!)

data.text: (WHOOOOOOOOOOAA!!)
data.processed: 󠁿(WHOOOOOOOOOOAA!!)

data.text:
It looks like this Uma Musume's strength wasn't a fluke!! 
This year's Derby, is an overwhelming victory!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿It looks like this Uma Musume's strength wasn't a fluke!! 
󠁿This year's Derby, is an overwhelming victory!

data.text: Haaa…! Haaa…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Haaa…! Haaa…!

data.text:
Fan favorite Silence Suzuka, 
was restrained and held to a 9th place finish!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Fan favorite Silence Suzuka, 
󠁿was restrained and held to a 9th place finish!

data.text: …kuu!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…kuu!
